name: Chanda Gundu: Island Polutics
description:
Hi guys, 

This is cryptic from ADHD studios, 

This game is all about that meme life :  this is our take of the comical circus that is the Sri Lankan political scene right now, 

This game is purely for the shits and giggles so  No hard feelings lul.

Enjoy and hope you all cast your vote on 16th wisely,

Also if you enjoy the game make sure to post your  winning screenshots on social media and hashtag #Chandagundu so everyone can join in on the fun. 
Cheers!
